title: Tour de France 2021 Standings
content:
General Classification / Yellow Jersey

After a disappointing first stage, Mathieu van der Poel delivered an exceptional performance on the Mûr-de-Bretagne to gain stage honours and the yellow jersey at his first Tour de France. Van der Poel overhauls Julian Alaphilppe, who will swap yellow for the rainbow bands. With two sprints stages next on stage 3 and 4, Van der Poel will be confident of holding the yellow jersey until the stage 5 time-trial.

1. Mathieu van der Poel
2. Julian Alaphilippe +0:08
3. Tadej Pogačar +0:13
4. Primož Roglič +0:14
5. Wilco Kelderman +0:24
6. Jack Haig +0:26
7. Bauke Mollema +0:26
8. Sergio Higuita +0:26
9. Jonas Vingegaard +0:26
10. David Gaudu +0:26

Tour de France 2021 Guide

Points Classification / Green Jersey

Julian Alaphilippe won stage one and finished fifth on stage two of the 2021 Tour de France which is enoguh to give the Frenchman the green jersey early on. However, that could change over the coming days with multiple opportunities for the sprinters.

1. Julian Alaphilippe - 66 points
2. Mathieu van der Poel - 50 points
3. Michael Matthews - 45 points
4. Tadej Pogačar - 44 points
5. Primož Roglič - 40 points

King of the Mountains Classification / Polka-Dot Jersey

Ide Schelling and Anthony Perez put on a show from the breakaway early on in stage 3, where they both gained a single point. However, Mathieu van der Poel was the first to cross the summit of the Mûr-de-Bretagne on both occasions, firing the Dutchman into not only the yellow jersey, but the lead of the King of the Mountains competition too.

1. Mathieu van der Poel - 4 points
2. Ide Schelling - 4 points
3. Anthony Perez - 3 points
4. Julian Alaphilippe - 2 points
5. Edward Theuns - 2 points

Young Rider's Classification / White Jersey

Tadej Pogačar is the big favourite for the white jersey and holds an early lead after he was second on stage 2. Sergio Higuita, Jonas Vingegaard and David Gaudu are the only riders that have been able to stay within a minute of the Slovenian.

1. Tadej Pogačar
2. Sergio Higuita +0:13
3. Jonas Vingegaard +0:13
4. David Gaudu +0:13
5. Lucas Hamilton +1:03

Team Classification

1. Team Jumbo-Visma
2. Astana - Premier Tech +0:32
3. Bahrain - Victorious +0:43
4. Trek - Segafredo +1:46
5. EF Education - Nippo +1:53
